div.div: TOO BIG TO FAIL

div.a: Facebook Is Too Big To Hate

div.div: The first billion was just the beginning. Only 6,000,000,000 to go.
HOPEFULLY NOT USING FPS

div.a: Pentagon Looks To Diagnose PTSD... With Video Games

div.div: To do their job and to stay alive, troops need to be in good psychological shape. The problem is that soldiers aren’t very forthcoming when it comes to talking about their mental health. That’s why the U.S. Army is proposing to use computer games to help with the diagnosis of disorders such as PTSD and mild traumatic brain injuries.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/O83qNj&via=Digg&text=Pentagon Looks To Diagnose PTSD... With Video Games

div.div: SOBERING STATISTICS

div.a: Prison Rape And Obama’s Program To Stop It

div.div: Approximately half of all sexual abuse in detention is committed by staff, not by inmates.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RJGQXW&via=Digg&text=Prison Rape And Obama’s Program To Stop It

div.div: BACK OFF, FACEBOOK

div.a: Facebook Is Reading Your Messages And Liking Things For You

div.div: You might think clicking "Like" is the only way to stamp that public FB affirmation on something—you're wrong.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UHejE4&via=Digg&text=Facebook Is Reading Your Messages And Liking Things For You

div.div: KEEP YOUR DRUGS AT HOME

div.a: Prosecutor Resigns After Joint Falls Out Of His Pocket In Court

div.div: "Sources painted a comical picture of the incident, saying a pair of cops glanced at the joint on the ground, then at each other before making arguably the easiest collar in the annals of policework."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rg7rx8&via=Digg&text=Prosecutor Resigns After Joint Falls Out Of His Pocket In Court

div.div: RUNNING FROM THE LAW

div.a: How The Pirate Bay Four Dodged Swedish Justice - For A While

div.div: The site's founders have moved out of Sweden, but Stockholm wants them back.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VcMati&via=Digg&text=How The Pirate Bay Four Dodged Swedish Justice - For A While

div.div: AND COST HIMSELF $60 BILLION

div.a: Meet The Man Who Sold 1,300 Tons Of Gold

div.div: If you are the person who sold 1,300 tons of Swiss gold in the pre-"New Normal" era, you probably would like to keep that fact to yourself. But not Michael Paprotta, or the guy who did sell 1,300 tons of gold for the Swiss National Bank from 2000 to 2005.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T5DzrD&via=Digg&text=Meet The Man Who Sold 1,300 Tons Of Gold

div.div: STICKY AND BEAUTIFUL

div.a: The Humble Airline Baggage Tag Is A Design Masterpiece

div.div: That random sticky strip you rip off your suitcase when you get home? It’s actually a masterpiece of design and engineering. Take a look through bag tags over the years.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PyIHyb&via=Digg&text=The Humble Airline Baggage Tag Is A Design Masterpiece

div.div: USE IT TO PATROL WALL STREET

div.a: American Vulture Fund Seizes Argentine Naval Vessel

div.div: Wall Street cherishes the idea that it is far more important than any government. That’s why we aren’t surprised that a hedge fund has seized an Argentine naval vessel to recoup past loans.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rg3599&via=Digg&text=American Vulture Fund Seizes Argentine Naval Vessel

div.div: REPUBLICANS HATE GAMERS

div.a: Does World Of Warcraft Disqualify This Woman From Maine's State Senate?

div.div: The Maine Republican Party has discovered that a Democratic candidate for state senate in Maine's 25th district leads a "double-life" on the online game World of Warcraft.

li.div: .@rosiegray @mildlyamusing collaboration on World of Warcraft and Maine politics is my fav thing on the web today buzzfeed.com/rosiegray/doe...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SJUnze&via=Digg&text=Does World Of Warcraft Disqualify This Woman From Maine's State Senate?

div.div: MONEY SHOT

div.a: Porn Site Seeks Receptive Charity For Large Donation

div.div: A pornographic website that said it launched a fundraising effort for and was adamantly rejected by Susan G. Komen for the Cure still wants to raise money for Breast Cancer Awareness Month.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R18HDO&via=Digg&text=Porn Site Seeks Receptive Charity For Large Donation

div.div: ATHLETE'S FOOT NOT INCLUDED

div.a: Broke Baseball Player May Have To Sell Bloody Sock

div.div: Former Red Sox pitcher Curt Schilling might have to sell the famed blood-stained sock he wore on the way to the 2004 World Series to cover his failed video game company.

li.div: I might disagree with him politically, but I'd give $10 to Schilling so he doesn't have to sell the bloody sock bigstory.ap.org/article/curt-s...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PU0Ojx&via=Digg&text=Broke Baseball Player May Have To Sell Bloody Sock

div.div: ARE HIS 15 MINUTES UP YET?

div.a: With Psy’s Blessing, GifBoom Holds A Gangnam Style GIF Contest

div.div: If that isn’t the perfect distillation of what’s trendy on the Internet right now, we don’t know what is.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/O879KM&via=Digg&text=With Psy’s Blessing, GifBoom Holds A Gangnam Style GIF Contest

div.div: GOOOOAAAAALLLLLL IS TO RIP PEOPLE OFF

div.a: Is EA Selling Old Games As New?

div.div: It appears that the videogame maker made few, if any, changes to FIFA 13.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SbRabk&via=Digg&text=Is EA Selling Old Games As New?

div.div: SIRI, ENGAGE THE TARGET

Military research and development has a long history of helping both soldier and civilian alike. It’s sometimes obvious on the outset how weapons of war might repurpose into instruments of peace. Sometimes, it's not so obvious.
JUMPING FRENCHMEN OF MAINE?!

div.a: The 5 Most Terrifying Diseases That Doctors Can't Explain

div.div: There are some particularly unusual diseases out there that have medical professionals throwing up their arms and declaring "Sh*t, we guess it's witchcraft."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RfaW6P&via=Digg&text=The 5 Most Terrifying Diseases That Doctors Can't Explain

div.div: GOOD TO KNOW

The widespread attention surrounding Big Bird since Wednesday night’s debate is proof that the newly politicized “Sesame Street” character has bipartisan appeal, generating a connection in people’s hearts “on both sides of the aisle,” says an executive for the children’s program.
CLOCK APP CRITIQUES

div.a: What Does A Watchmaker Think About The iPhone 5?

div.div: Apple claims that they have borrwoed some design elements and technologies from watchmaking, most notably the use of sapphire crystal over the camera, so what does a real watchmaker think about Apple's design?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T15Dan&via=Digg&text=What Does A Watchmaker Think About The iPhone 5?

div.div: BEFORE THERE WAS BUTT CHUGGING

div.a: Decoding Secret Societies: What Are All Those Old Boys’ Clubs Hiding?

div.div: Their members use secret handshakes and coded language. In temples, they don ancient regalia, helmets, or masks. Thanks to their veils of secrecy and archaic symbols like the All-Seeing Eye, outsiders find fraternal orders endlessly fascinating. But what does it all mean?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rf9D83&via=Digg&text=Decoding Secret Societies: What Are All Those Old Boys’ Clubs Hiding?
